## <span style="color:  #5B1A18;"> Bio</span>

I am a PhD student in the <a href="https://www.cpr.ku.dk/research/proteinsignaling/mailand/"><span style="color:  #F1BB7B;"> Mailand Lab</span></a> in the Center for Protein Research at University of
Copenhagen. I am part of the <a href="https://cphbiosciencephd.org/"><span style="color:  #F1BB7B;">  Copenhagen Bioscience PhD Programme</span></a> and the Molecular Mechanisms of Disease graduate school.

I am highly interested in understanding mechanisms of cellular stress responses and exploring pathways involved in maintaining genome integrity. 

During my PhD I aim to develop targeted approaches combining cell biology and high resolution omics technologies to study DNA repair mechanisms and the consequences of DNA damages.
